Body:
hyper = Hypergeometric(rand=None, M=100, m=20, X=40, xlim=(0, 20), N=7)
x, y = hyper.data
for i, j in zip(x, [0, 3, 6, 10, 13, 16, 20]):
    assert abs(i - j) < TOLERANCE
for i, j in zip(y, [7.82084807e-06, 0.00713781508, 0.124220553, 0.119236052,
    0.00867063085, 5.71825289e-05, 2.57184339e-10]):
    assert abs(i - j) < TOLERANCE
